Log Dispatch

Source: R/dispatch.R
LogDispatch.Rd

R6 Class that dispatches log messages throughout the application.

Details

This object is designed to a centralized logging dispatcher that renders log messages with the appropriate context of the calling object. The log_layout object is used to generate log message layouts (render formats), which are used by the LogDispatcher to render highly-customizable and detailed log messages.

See also

Other Logging: attach_log_levels(), configure_logger(), display_log_levels(), init_logger(), load_log_layouts(), set_log_configuration()

Creates a new instance of a log config.

Usage

A new LogLayout object.

Method add_log_level()

Adds dynamic function as a short-cut to log a message with a configured level.

Usage

LogDispatch$add_log_level(level)

Arguments

level

log level

Returns

reference to self to support chaining.

Public wrapper around logger settings.

Usage

Returns

logger settings.

Public wrapper around updating settings.

Usage

Arguments

Logger settings.

Returns

None.
